extraction_point.description: [bool]True if this shuttle can be used as an extraction point.

dynamic_door_enabled.description: [bool]True means we will raycast to determine the doors wanted angle.

dynamic_door_min_angle.description: The minimum angle our door can have.

dynamic_door_max_angle.description: The maximum angle our door can have.

dynamic_door_start_node.description: [string]The start node (hinge point) of the door.

dynamic_door_end_node.description: [string]The end node (very top) of the door that we will raycast down from.

dynamic_door_anim_variable.description: [string]The animation variable that we will send the calculated dynamic door angle to.

dynamic_door_overlap_name.description: [string]The name of the overlap that we enable/disable based on if the door is moving or not.
